replies.body: Make an app for this, would be much cooler to be able to access it from my phone without the hassle of messing with a browser.
genious response to an already genious idea. This whole fantasy draft is a really nice surprise. GJ riot.

{{champion:55}}

I can't help but think about Onion News Network's "Tough Season" series, which pokes fun at how worked up people get about their fantasy football. And now we've got fantasy leagues for a league of fantasy? Oh dear... I think this might be a bit too meta for me right now.

because the asians compete in the LPL and GPA not the LCS. Can you draft NBA players for your NFL fantasy team?

That's a stretch. At least between LPL/GPA and LCS it's the same game. It's a better comparison to say "Can you draft CFL (Canadian Football League) players for your NFL fantasy team?" Answer is still no.
